hero.title: Zero Operational Burden
hero.description: We handle everything. You get reliable power. The adoption challenge isn't the hardware—it's the logistics. That's why we manage the entire operation.

steps.title: Schedule
steps.description: We coordinate timing with your events. Book batteries days or weeks in advance through our online portal, phone, or email.

steps.title: Deliver
steps.description: Batteries arrive fully charged, tested, and ready to connect. Our team handles placement and coordinates with your vendors.

steps.title: Support
steps.description: Real-time monitoring ensures your power stays on. Issues? We respond immediately with backup units if needed.

steps.title: Pickup
steps.description: Scheduled pickup after your event. Batteries return to our facility for charging, testing, and maintenance.

items.title: Zero Operational Burden
items.description: We handle all logistics from delivery to pickup, charging, and maintenance. Your team focuses on events, not battery management.

items.title: Proven Track Record
items.description: Over 500 successful deployments since 2022 across 100+ job sites with zero operational incidents.

items.title: 24/7 Support
items.description: Real-time monitoring and emergency response ensures your power stays on throughout your event.

items.title: Complete Logistics
items.description: Delivery, setup, placement, vendor coordination, and pickup all handled by our trained team.

items.title: Real-Time Monitoring
items.description: 24/7 monitoring with instant alerts and emergency response if issues arise during your event.

items.title: Full Maintenance
items.description: All charging, testing, and maintenance handled at our facility between deployments.

items.title: Flexible Scheduling
items.description: Book days or weeks in advance with recurring event automation and last-minute availability.
